mdRecord.dcterms:title: A treatise of gavelkind both name and thing: shewing the true etymologie and derivation of the one, the nature, antiquity, and original of the other : with sundry emergent observations both pleasant and profitable to be known of Kentish-men and others, especially such as are studious either of the ancient custome or the common law of this kingdome / by a well-willer to both, William Somner
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Somner, William, 1598-1669
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by R. and W. Leybourn for the author and are to be sold by John Crooke, and Daniel White
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Gavelkind--Early works to 1800.
